text: Hello all, can Invoke return a message to the client? I'm returning errors but the rest reply is always OK
<@U3AFRMY68> in 0.6 and other non-master releases, only the Query directly returns. Invoke and deploy are just “submits” which return a transaction id (a reciept) for the submission
<@U0ULK2JPP> does the master release support the return in invoke and deploy?
right at some level they are, but for the SDK and end user, it does return a result directly (as opposed to 0.5)
<@U0ULK2JPP> corrected me off line... invoke is synchrounous in v1.0 - I need to brush up on all the changes since my vacation and extended travels
:smile: is there already some guidlines available for setting up a test environment for v1.0?
or docker images I can pull and start testing ?
There is <https://jira.hyperledger.org/secure/attachment/10242/simple_test_with_skeletal_peer.md> … I thought <@U0KM61BCP> may have a simpler instruction set ? …
Also I thin docker based testing is also possible… not sure of the instructions though
<@U3AFRMY68> I am working on the docs now. We haven't yet published any images, you would need to build them locally for testing
